topic.title: <TreeItemTemplate>
topic.p: <TreeItemTemplate/> derives from <TextListItemTemplate/>. It has the following properties additional to its base class:

topic.title: Expanding
topic.p: This property is assigned by the list control. When the child item list is expanded, this property becomes true. When the child item list is collapsed, this property becomes false.

topic.title: Expandable
topic.p: This property is assigned by the list control. This property is true when there are child items under this item. When child items are added to or removed from this item, this property could change.

topic.title: Level
topic.p: This property is assigned by the list control. For all top level items rendered in the list control (which are child items under the root item), the Level is 0. For all other items, their Level is one greater than its parent item.

topic.title: Image
topic.p: This property is assigned by the list control. It is the image of the item.
